SAJAG INDIA 

Sajag is your one-stop app for disaster preparedness and communication. We are committed to empowering citizens with real-time information and fostering a collaborative environment during disasters.

Get real-time weather updates to anticipate threats. Witness a disaster? Report it with images to our map-based system, helping others stay informed.

Communicate in emergencies through Aapda Samvaad. Share updates, images, and notes. React to posts and follow users for crucial info.

Be prepared with Marg Darshika's DOs and DON'Ts for various disasters.

Stay updated on nearby incidents with the \View\ section. Security is our priority, with OTP login and email signup.

Download Sajag today! Together, we can be disaster ready.
